long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VideoCatcher is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of downloading videos in MP4 format. With a focus on speed and efficiency, ClipCatcher allows you to effortlessly save your favorite clips from a wide range of websites, including popular platforms like Facebook and Twitter.

Simply install ClipCatcher and browse the web as usual. When you encounter a video you want to keep, our extension will automatically detect downloadable content. With a single click, you can initiate the download and save the video to your device.

Aditional functionality:
-Play videos option before download
-Show the downloader in the popup or side panel

Key Features:

Lightning-fast downloads: Experience rapid video conversion and saving.
MP4 format: Enjoy high-quality video playback on any device.
Wide compatibility: Works with numerous websites that allow video downloads.
User-friendly interface: Easy-to-use design for a seamless experience.
Stop wasting time and bandwidth streaming videos. Download your favorite clips with ClipCatcher and enjoy them offline whenever you want.

Download ClipCatcher today and start building your video collection!
